definitions.definition: Something that portends an event about to occur, especially an unfortunate or evil event; an omen .
examples: It was a portent of things to come.

definitions.definition: Something regarded as portentous ; a marvel ; prodigy .

main_definition: Something that portends an event about to occur, especially an unfortunate or evil event; an omen .
secondary_definitions: Something regarded as portentous ; a marvel ; prodigy .
